personalInfo.name: Mubashir Younus
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer
personalInfo.bio: Web developer with strong experience in React, Next.js, JavaScript, and responsive web design. Skilled in building user-friendly interfaces, API integrations, and database development. Specialized in AI prompt engineering and creating AI agents for Agile Development techniques.

workExperience.summary: Developed responsive web applications using React, Next.js, and JavaScript with focus on AI integration and modern development practices.
responsibilities: Developed responsive web applications using React, Next.js, and JavaScript with custom components and user-friendly interfaces.
Integrated third-party services including AI chatbots and payment systems with expertise in prompt and context engineering.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams following modern development practices and worked with SQL databases and API development.

workExperience.summary: Developed full-stack web and mobile applications using PHP frameworks and Flutter with extensive API integrations.
responsibilities: Developed web applications using PHP frameworks including Laravel and Yii2 with responsive frontends using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
Built mobile applications for Android and iOS using Flutter, implementing custom interfaces and API integrations.
Integrated various APIs including payment gateways and logistics services, developed database-driven applications with SQL Server and MySQL.

workExperience.summary: Provided comprehensive customer service through multiple channels including tech support, sales and customer care.
responsibilities: Provided telephone and live-chat customer service including tech support and sales assistance.
Worked with major customer service software platforms to ensure customer satisfaction.
Handled customer inquiries and technical issues efficiently across multiple communication channels.

workExperience.summary: Managed pharmacy inventory system and network infrastructure across multiple branches.
responsibilities: Managed pharmacy's stock across multiple branches ensuring accurate inventory tracking.
Configured and maintained server configuration for the pharmacy's intranet network structure.
Ensured system reliability and data integrity across all pharmacy locations.

projects.title: Zia Library
projects.description: Ziauddin Islamic Audio library contains 20,000+ media files accessible in all major platforms. A comprehensive library for Islamic audio content including lectures, recitations, and educational materials.
projects.keyLearnings: Building a large-scale media library required optimizing search algorithms and implementing efficient caching strategies. Learning to handle massive audio databases and provide seamless cross-platform experiences was invaluable.

projects.title: Majmooa e Naat
projects.description: Great multi-lingual library to read and share Islamic poetry lyrics. Features a beautiful collection of Naat (Islamic poetry) in multiple languages with sharing capabilities.
projects.keyLearnings: Implementing multi-language support and Unicode text rendering for Urdu and Arabic scripts taught me the importance of proper internationalization and handling right-to-left languages.

projects.title: iZiarat
projects.description: Enhance your travel with iZiarat which provides a visual representation of all nearby places drawn on a map. Perfect for pilgrims and travelers to discover and navigate to important Islamic sites.
projects.keyLearnings: Integrating Google Maps API and implementing location-based services taught me about geolocation, map rendering optimization, and creating intuitive navigation experiences for mobile users.

projects.title: Elm ul Adad
projects.description: Arabic & Urdu numerology calculator. A pocket tool for calculating Abjad count of any name. With added functionality of finding Ism e Azam. Our database has 150,000+ Ism e Azam combinations of 1, 2 or 3 Asma al Husnah.
projects.keyLearnings: Working with complex Arabic numerology algorithms and managing large datasets of 150,000+ combinations required efficient database indexing and search optimization techniques.

projects.title: Time Sequence
projects.description: Timeline of all Islamic events in the past 1400+ years. Our data dates back all the way to before Hijrah. You can jump to any year and see a timeline of all events that occurred in that year. You can also see relations between events.
projects.keyLearnings: Creating an interactive timeline interface with 1400+ years of historical data required innovative UI/UX design and efficient data visualization techniques to make complex historical information accessible.

projects.title: True Quran
projects.description: Recite Quran with transliteration, translation and tafsir with True Quran. A comprehensive Quran reading application with multiple translation options and detailed commentary.
projects.keyLearnings: Developing a Quran application required careful attention to Arabic text rendering, audio synchronization, and respectful handling of sacred content with precise accuracy.

projects.title: WhatsApp Direct
projects.description: Light-weight open-source Android app project through which you can directly send whatsapp messages without saving their phone number. A simple utility that enhances WhatsApp usability.
projects.keyLearnings: Creating a lightweight utility app taught me the importance of simplicity and focused functionality. Open-sourcing the project also gave me experience in community engagement and code documentation.

projects.title: Hajj wa Umrah
projects.description: (Fatawa) Hajj wa Umrah is a unicode collection of Hajj and Umrah related masail taken from the book 'العُرْوَۃُ فِیْ مَنَاسِکِ الحَجِّ وَ العُمْرَۃ' written by Shaikh ul Hadees Allama Mufti Muhammad Ata Ullah Naeemi. This app is owned by Jamiat e Isha`t e Ahle Sunnat (Pakistan).
projects.keyLearnings: Working on religious educational content required accuracy and attention to detail. Implementing proper Arabic text handling and creating a user-friendly interface for religious guidance was both challenging and rewarding.

projects.title: Naat Academy
projects.description: Feature-wise this app resembles a lot and is inspired by Majmooa e Naat while maintaining its own uniqueness in design and content. This app is owned by Owais Razvi (AwesCreative) (India).
projects.keyLearnings: Building upon the experience from Majmooa e Naat, this project taught me how to create variations of successful products while maintaining unique identity and client-specific requirements.

projects.title: Sacred Traditions
projects.description: Sacred Traditions brings you beautiful images of the beautiful Ahadith (Sacred Sayings) of the most. We have translations in 40+ languages making Islamic teachings accessible to a global audience.
projects.keyLearnings: Implementing 40+ language translations taught me about scalable internationalization architecture and the importance of creating visual content that transcends language barriers.

projects.title: Inheritance Calculator
projects.description: Inheritance Calculator – your trusted online tool for precise and compliant inheritance calculations in accordance with Sunni Islamic law. Create and share inheritance statements seamlessly with your loved ones for transparency and peace of mind.
projects.keyLearnings: Building a calculator for Islamic inheritance law required understanding complex legal frameworks and translating them into precise algorithms. Ensuring accuracy and compliance was paramount.

codeSnippets.title: Custom React Hook for Fetching Data
codeSnippets.description: A reusable React hook that simplifies API calls by handling loading, error, and data states.

testimonials.quote: Working with [Your Name] was a game-changer. Their technical expertise and dedication to our project's success were outstanding. I can't recommend them enough.

articles.title: Understanding Async/Await in JavaScript
articles.description: A deep dive into the mechanics of asynchronous JavaScript, explaining the event loop and how async/await simplifies writing asynchronous code.

details: Advanced study in computer science and software engineering
Specialized in web development and AI integration
Foundation in computer science principles and programming
Relevant Coursework: Data Structures, Algorithms, Web Development, Database Systems
